titles.title: To authorize appropriations for grants for specialized technical assistance and training to improve the quality of criminal investigation and prosecution of child abuse cases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Authorizes appropriations for FY2006-FY2010 under the Victims of Child Abuse Act of 1990 for grants to the American Prosecutors Research Institute for technical assistance and training to attorneys and others instrumental to the criminal prosecution of child abuse cases in state or federal courts.
